references.reason: As one of the reference papers, GPT-4 Technical Report is considered important because it reports the performance of the GPT-4 model, against which the improvements of the NoisyRollout are compared to.

references.paper_title: Flamingo: A Visual Language Model for Few-Shot Learning
references.reason: The visual language model Flamingo introduces foundational integration techniques between vision and language components, which is essential for the work on VLMs in NoisyRollout.

references.paper_title: BLIP-2: Bootstrapping Language-Image Pre-training with Frozen Image Encoders and Large Language Models
references.reason: BLIP-2 establishes foundational integration techniques between vision and language components which is essential for work on VLMs in NoisyRollout.
This paper introduces effective visual instruction tuning methodologies, which significantly advances multimodal capabilities, and is important to the multimodal capabilities in NoisyRollout.

references.paper_title: Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback
references.reason: This work sets the stage for human feedback-based reinforcement learning, a key technique applied in and related to NoisyRollout.
